2073.subject: LL
2073.descrlong: Views the end of the 多Middle Ages多 and the transition to the Renaissance period of rapid intellectual change and the growth of science and religion. Explores the world-view of the Great Goddess system and its contribution to the magical world, setting the stage for the rise of patriarchal religious thought and the rise of science. Links the effects of Bubonic Plague, Neo-Platonism, Alchemy, the Protestant Reformation, the Crusades, the Bible, the burning of 多witches,多 and the printing press to the intellectual ferment that characterized this period of European history. (LL Core class)
